verbs.description: Trump [V: has] been using well - known black people to make himself more appealing .
Trump has [V: been] using well - known black people to make himself more appealing .
[ARG0: Trump] has been [V: using] [ARG1: well - known black people] [ARG2: to make himself more appealing] .
Trump has been using [ARGM-ADV: well] - [V: known] [ARG1: black people] to make himself more appealing .
[ARG0: Trump] has been using well - known black people to [V: make] [ARG1: himself more appealing] .
